Source.Name: perl-data-uniqid
Source.Summary: Perl extension for simple generation of unique IDs
Source.Description: Data::Uniqid provides three simple routines for generating unique ids. These ids are coded with a Base62 systen to make them short and handy (e.g. to use it as part of a URL).

Package.Name: perl-data-uniqid
